name: Deeper Into The Mind
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deeper-into-the-mind

RATE OUR GAME! You can click this link and rate the game on Ludum Dare.

WASD to move point to aim with mouse. Hold mouse button for continuous fire.

Attack the tentacles of the Fear of Darkness Boss and attack the body, beware of its scream attack and the bullet hell tentacles. 

The ground falls out below and you fall to the next boss level, Guilt boss. The boss points at you and fires its guilt ridden bullets to bring you down.  The stained glass boss will teleport to another area, where it will search with its laser vision.

BugFix0.5.1 : fixed the end screen, you can now quit the game.

BugFix0.5.2: I reconnected the music that I disconnected to troubleshoot the quit game problem.
